Text:
I was looking quite a while for this torrent, and finally I found one. But there's an issue:
I Followed the instructions correctly as provided, but still receive the error on top of the main window:
License: "Validation Required".
Any solution for this plz?
^^ can it still update w/o validating?

surprisingly: yes! And even scanning. So all pro-features seem enabled and doing well. I wonder why, because IObit usually validates each serial nr and if not valid (error: validation required) pro-functions usually don't work until validation has taken place. So no complaints, just find this msg rather annoying. Maybe I'm pettifogging, if that's the case, my apologies, cuz' it's doing well And Thx BTW!:)
Thank you
Possible to update?
Thanks for the download but none of those serials worked for me....

Key works as you know dissabe internet connection, when you start installation. Afer installation click uppgrade you`ll see a box there you can paste the id.
Click enter and you`ll see PRO. Now can You turn on or connect your internet.

Thanks KK. I wanted this for a long time, and like always you come through. Keep up the great work you do. Thanks again.
{Peace}

Tried to activate with internet disconnected and it would not work. Says cannot connect to server, said have to buy new license, but it still says Pro and everything works and gets updates.
{Peace}

My copy says that the activation code didn't work either, but it did. When you close the activation box after it tells you that it didn't work, if you look up in the top left hand corner of the scan, if it says "Pro" beside the name of the application, then it worked. (Even if it says it didn't.)

Thanks for the torrent! I've been wanting this. Clean and virus free, just the way I like it. Thanks hun!

*Shannon*

works great no virus and the key works offline only. As for updates you need only activate then go to IObit site and DL the new version install, then you can update with no problem. hope this helps everyone DL this torrent more its great. on a side another great torrent is advanced system care. made by same site IObit. the code i used for pro for that one is name: DiG   
Key: 1534-1534-1534-1534....this is for Advanced system pro by IObit
I upgraded when it asked me to, selecting Pro version. Used the serial you provided and worked a dream - thank you!
thanks kk

That's right. FlirtyNerd is right. Same happened to me. Who cares as long it works...
10x.
you are all wrong, you still need to validate it!
works like a charm, cheers uploader
